topic.title: XDCR
topic.shortdesc: The XDCR panel is used to create a remote cluster reference and specify replication.

section.title: Create cluster reference
section.p: To create a cluster reference, provide the cluster name, IP or hostname, administrator username and password and whether or not to enable encryption (Enterprise Edition only).

section.title: Create replication
section.p: To create a replication, provide the bucket to replicated on the remote cluster, the remote cluster and bucket, and modify any advanced XDCR settings.
